channel.title: ~ Edge4Pk ~ 317 - Delta
channel.description:
-This server is only online for friends/Server helpers. If everthing is done we gone start with a good VPS- Hello everone.
[size=10pt]I downloaded a sourch named Airscape v3. I coded alot on it and i am gone make it a [u]pure[/u] pk server.[/size] We have 45$ on a Paypal account for the Vps.
What does it have : *Extreme Potions. *Overload. *[u]Chaotic[/u] Weapons. *A look a like turmoil *[b]All[/b] special are working. (Ags, Bgs, Zgs, Sgs, Dragon Claws etc.) *A windows 7/Vista 7 runner. (:P) *Working GodWars Npc's. *Giant Mole. *Skillcape emotes! *The real Veng emote. *All Spirit shields.
What did i added : *Coded new home in Edvillage *Pkshop. *Overload Fixed. It works now *Added Super strenght pot. *Added shops. *Added ALOT of commands like ::ags, ::melee and ::dbow *added a new Minigame (own maded) *Added a custom Bounty hunter if you dont like the Wildy. *10x Hits for the guys who like it.
What do we need.
Coder & Owner & Project leader : Snoepie1012 (me)
Photoshop/Picture maker : We have.
Someone that can make a webclient from OUR client : Needed!
Someone that it realy good in coding websites/forums : Needed!
If you are intrested full this in.
Name : Age : Choose : Coder/Website coder/Webclient Maker How long Experience in this : Your MSN email : Other info that may help me know more about you and your Experience!? :
Thank you!
Picture time! :P
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2hywh91.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/k3vsxv.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/vmw5ms.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/zmfwom.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/ju8uol.jpg[/img]
Thank you!
